name: Onsen Token
public_notice: Aegis Token (AEG) has rebranded to Onsen Token (ON) and recently migrated from their old contract to a new one. For more information, please visit this Twitter post.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Aegis is a native decentralized exchange (DEX) built on Arbitrum, driven by community, and designed to build liquidity around blue-chip assets. 
The protocol will focus on providing emission incentives for blue-chip assets with real yields such as derivatives and LSD assets. V2 will build the Aegis ecosystem based on the Aegis protocol for governance and blue-chip asset liquidity.
